name: Cod Fish Cakes
author: DRAGON11
summary: Delicious fish cakes made with cod, potatoes, onion, butter, and parsley! You can substitute salmon for cod if you would rather make salmon cakes.
directions: Place the potatoes in a large pot of water, bring the water to a boil
Let the potatoes cook until they are almost tender
Add the fish to the pot and let the fish and potatoes cook until they are both soft
Drain well and transfer the potatoes and fish to a large mixing bowl
Add butter, onion, parsley, and egg to the bowl; mash the mixture together
Heat oil in a large skillet over a medium-high heat
Fry the patties on both sides until golden brown
Drain on paper towels before serving
